CustomField.description: Determines the format used to present contextual SObject data to the LLM. The agent's 'Instructions Prompt' should be written to match this chosen format for best results.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Choose how data is formatted for the AI. 'JSON' is compact and most token-efficient for modern LLMs. 'Structured Text' uses YAML format internally - human-readable and good for debugging. Match your Instructions Prompt to the selected format.
CustomField.label: Context Format Strategy
